alert.note: Alert for Hempstead; Howard; Little River; Nevada; Sevier (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 16 at 2:23PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Little River, northern Hempstead, southeastern Sevier, southeastern Howard and northwestern Nevada Counties through 315 PM CDT... At 223 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Wilton, or near Ashdown, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ashdown, Nashville, Mineral Springs, Wilton, Blevins, Tollette, Washington, Ben Lomond, Corinth, Saratoga, Center Point, Richmond, Oak Grove, McCaskill, Ozan, Bright Star, Silver Ridge, Muddy Fork, Millwood and Arden. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
